(source file: SessionManager.pizza)

   +----zeta.session.SessionManager
The pure class interface. 
public abstract class SessionManager
A session manager allows to create and open sessions.

Author:
Wolfgang Grieskamp (wg@cs.tu-berlin.de)
Version: $Id: SessionManager.pizza,v 1.1.1.1 1998/09/01 10:51:21 wg Exp $

SessionManager()

create(String)
Create a session working on a new empty project, based on the current default session
createProject(String)
The creation method of a session manager.
getManager()
Get the default session manager.
open(String)
Create a session working on an exisiting project, based on the current default session
openProject(String)
The open method of a session manager.
setManager(SessionManager)
Set the default session manager.
